TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyGrid extends System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid

summary.span: 表示可添加到 Microsoft Office Word 文档的 Windows 窗体 。

span.span: Represents a Windows Forms that can be added to a Microsoft Office Word document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同。The is different from a . 具有其他成员, 使其能够添加到 Word 文档中, 并为其提供附加方法和属性。The has additional members that enable it to be added to a Word document and that give it additional methods and properties. 不要使用构造函数来创建新的。Do not use the constructor to create a new . 使用方法向文档中添加一个新的。 Use the method to add a new to a document.

summary.span: 获取 的下边缘与该文档的上边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: Gets the distance, in points, between the bottom edge of the and the top edge of the document.

value.span: 的下边缘与文档上边缘之间的距离 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The distance, in points, between the bottom edge of the and the top edge of the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值等于属性值和属性值的总和。The value of this property is equal to the sum of the property value and the property value. 属性使用点, 而属性使用像素。 The property uses points, whereas the property uses pixels. ## Examples 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例, 请参见。For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see . 命名空间中的所有控件都具有功能`Bottom`等效的属性。All controls in the namespace have a functionally equivalent `Bottom` property.

summary.span: 从该文档中删除动态创建的 并将其从 中移除。

span.span: Deletes a dynamically created from the document and removes it from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应仅用于在运行时以编程方式创建的。This method should only be used with a that is created programmatically at run time. 如果在设计时添加到文档的上调用此方法, 则会引发异常。An exception is thrown if you call this method on a that is added to the document at design time. ## Examples 有关演示如何使用此方法的代码示例, 请参见。For a code example that demonstrates how to use this method, see . 命名空间中的所有控件都具有功能`Delete`上等效的方法。All controls in the namespace have a functionally equivalent `Delete` method.

span.span: Gets the underlying of the .
The underlying of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够获取控件在文档中的精确位置。The property enables you to get the exact position of the control on the document. 如果控件的换行样式未设置为 **"随文本对齐**", 则属性将返回`null`。If the wrapping style of the control is not set to **In line with text**, the property returns `null`.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的左边缘与该文档的左边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance, in points, between the left edge of the and the left edge of the document.

value.span: 的左边缘与文档左边缘之间的距离 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The distance, in points, between the left edge of the and the left edge of the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用点, 而属性使用像素。 The property uses points, whereas property uses pixels. 只能使用非嵌入到文本的控件的属性。You can only use the property of a control that is not in line with text. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time). ## Examples 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例, 请参见。For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see . 命名空间中的所有控件都具有功能`Left`等效的属性。All controls in the namespace have a functionally equivalent `Left` property.
